descriptionHtml:
Killcams happen more frequently.

There are a couple of known issues:
KillCams are apparently hardcoded to only happen when you kill the last enemy in a group, or finish a one-on-one confrontation (such as a sneaking kill within a group).
Draugr sometimes do not initiate a KillCam - I believe this is due to the existence of other draugr waiting in ambush tombs.

This has been removed from TESNexus and reuploaded here! Sorry for all the confusion.
author: DrMelon
